messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats: - Run many of our biggest cities, from Sheffield and Liverpool to St Albans and Portsmouth - Have won more votes than Labour in the last two elections. - Can deliver real change across Britain today.

messages.title: Investing in our schools and in our future
messages.content: There is nothing more important for our future than having good schools and successful colleges. Our future prosperity depends upon it.

messages.title: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives
messages.content: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm boss Tory Health plans would see your local NHS lose £650m over 4 years. Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS.

messages.title: Four steps to a fairer Britain
messages.content: 1. Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket 2. A fair chance for every child 3. A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener 4. A fair deal for you from the politicians

messages.title: Protecting rail services
messages.content: Having great rail services to London is essential for the prosperity of the town. Peter has campaigned for quick decisions from the government, forcing franchises and for better care for passengers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket.
A fair chance for every child.
Create jobs by making Britain greener.
A fair deal for you from the politicians.
Opposition to Conservative health plans, support for the National Health Service and prevention of funding cuts.
Committed to improving rail services, ensuring quick decisions from government, and advocating for better passenger care.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners.
mentions.partyLeader: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats winning support across Britain.

issues.education: Investing in our schools and in our future.
issues.environment: Create jobs by making Britain greener.

leaflet.personalStatement: Peter Welch: the experience we need for the changes we want.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
